description: 1 x London plane (200100015117) Prune back branches overhanging terrace and coming into contact with temporary structure back to provide around 0.5m from front elevation, pruning back to appropriate lateral branch.1 x London plane (200100015118)  Prune back branches over hanging terrace and west Watergate, pruning  back to appropriate lateral branch.  Prune branches over the west Watergate to provide 1m clearance of lions of around 1m.  Ensure height clearance of around 3m above the terrace level. 1 x London plane (200100015119)  Reduce lower main branch growing over west Watergate, back to lateral branch approximately 1m from front elevation. Prune back remaining crown to provide at least 0.5m clearance from front elevation to a height of around 3m above the terrace level.2 x London plane (200100015120 and 200100015121)  Prune back  to provide 0.5m clearance from front elevation ,to a height of around 3m above the terrace level.5 x London plane (200100015122, 200100015227, 200100015228, 200100015229 and 200100015237): Prune back  to provide 0.5m clearance from front elevation ,to a height of around 3m above the terrace level.
